page.title: 13Morwenstow teenage pastimes
page.content: Cycling is popular but there is little public transport so children's mobility is limited until they are old enough to drive and can acquire the use of a motorbike or car. When it is fine they enjoy going to the beach for a variety of activities;swimming,beach games, sunbathing, barbecues etc. football, cricket and riding are also popular. Many wish that there was a nearer indoor swimming pool.One keen young family of swimmers travels to Barnstaple several times a week for training. There are no regular organised activities for teenagers at present, but following the opening of the Community Centre it is planned to start a Youth Club for the 10-15 age group. This is planned to offer football, net ball, snooker etc. And later, perhaps discos which are also popular.
